_comment: Configuration file for prohibition rules - Add new country combinations here
_instructions: Developers can add new prohibition rules by adding entries to this file. No code changes needed!

US_PII_TO_RESTRICTED.description: Prohibits transfer of PII from US to restricted countries
US_PII_TO_RESTRICTED.prohibition_description: Prohibition on transferring PII from US to China, Hong Kong, Macao, Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Russia, Venezuela

US_DATA_TO_CHINA_CLOUD.description: Prohibits storing/processing US data in China cloud storage
US_DATA_TO_CHINA_CLOUD.prohibition_description: Data owned, created, developed, or maintained in US cannot be stored or processed in China cloud storage

US_HEALTH_DATA.description: Prohibits transfer of health data from US without approval
US_HEALTH_DATA.prohibition_description: Prohibition on transferring health-related data from US without approval
